name: part_000
file: tmp_【#ブラちょこ】Black choco Christmas！5周年３DLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [YjTnRIIczcE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening chibi animation with background music showing Yuzuki Choco drinking strawberry milk.
Title card for Yuzuki Choco's 5th Anniversary Live: Black choco Christmas!
Yuzuki Choco performs "Sickbay Mistake" live on stage.

subtitles.original: Strawberry & Milk
subtitles.english: Strawberry & Milk

subtitles.original: Choco
subtitles.english: Choco

subtitles.original: Black choco Christmas!
subtitles.english: Black choco Christmas!

subtitles.original: Yuzuki Choco 5th Anniversary LIVE!
subtitles.english: Yuzuki Choco 5th Anniversary LIVE!

subtitles.original: 重大告知あり！
subtitles.english: Important Announcement!

subtitles.original: Sickbay Mistake
subtitles.english: Sickbay Mistake

subtitles.original: 作詞：藤村鼓乃美(Hifumi,inc.)
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Konomi Fujimura (Hifumi, inc.)

subtitles.original: 作曲・編曲：グシミヤギヒデユキ(Hifumi,inc.)
subtitles.english: Composition & Arrangement: Hideyuki Gushimiyagi (Hifumi, inc.)

subtitles.original: あー！
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: ピンク色　ココア　淡い日差し
subtitles.english: Pink-colored cocoa, faint sunlight

subtitles.original: カーテンが揺れる　君の声
subtitles.english: The curtains sway, your voice

subtitles.original: 近づく足音だけですぐ分かる
subtitles.english: I can tell immediately just by the sound of approaching footsteps

subtitles.original: 今日はどんな味が欲しい？
subtitles.english: What flavor do you want today?

subtitles.original: ささやかクマの誘惑　U want it?
subtitles.english: A modest bear's temptation. You want it?

subtitles.original: Sickbay で待ち合わせ　密かな予感
subtitles.english: Meeting up at the sickbay, a secret premonition

subtitles.original: 扉あけて　さあこちらおいで
subtitles.english: Open the door and come over here

subtitles.original: 教科書に載っていない　この気持ちは何ですか？
subtitles.english: What is this feeling that's not in the textbooks?

subtitles.original: 可愛い　可愛い　顔見せて
subtitles.english: Show me your cute, cute face

subtitles.original: Sickbay で会いましょう　魅了しちゃう
subtitles.english: Let's meet at the sickbay, I'll charm you

subtitles.original: 永遠に続き　時間よ止まって
subtitles.english: Continue forever, time stop

subtitles.original: 女子には見せられない　笑顔の秘密は
subtitles.english: The secret of the smile I can't show to other girls is

subtitles.original: 甘い　甘い　お菓子あげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you sweet, sweet treats

subtitles.original: ささやかクマの誘惑　Ah ah ah
subtitles.english: A modest bear's temptation. Ah ah ah

subtitles.original: 秒針のリズムを追い越していく
subtitles.english: Overtaking the rhythm of the second hand

subtitles.original: 聞かせて　もっと君のこと
subtitles.english: Tell me more about yourself

subtitles.original: 触れる指先で奏でるチューン
subtitles.english: A tune played by touching fingertips

subtitles.original: 騒ぎだす鼓動　鳴り響くわ
subtitles.english: My throbbing heart is echoing

subtitles.original: もう後には戻れない
subtitles.english: There's no turning back now

subtitles.original: 目配せ、鼻歌、上目遣い、見つめ合って
subtitles.english: A wink, a hum, an upward glance, looking at each other

subtitles.original: 永遠の楽園に咲く　甘美な言葉
subtitles.english: Sweet words blooming in the eternal paradise

subtitles.original: 耳元で囁いてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll whisper in your ear

subtitles.original: Sickbay で待ってるわ　密かな時間
subtitles.english: I'll be waiting in the sickbay, a secret time

subtitles.original: 扉しめて　もっと近づいて
subtitles.english: Close the door and come closer

subtitles.original: 神様も止められない　この気持ちの正体
subtitles.english: The true nature of this feeling even God can't stop

subtitles.original: 知らないふりは　もうできない
subtitles.english: I can't pretend not to know anymore

subtitles.original: Sickbay で会いたいの　魅了しましょう
subtitles.english: I want to see you in the sickbay, let's charm each other

subtitles.original: 永遠はここにあるって信じて
subtitles.english: Believe that eternity is here

subtitles.original: 君にしか見せられない　笑顔の裏側は
subtitles.english: The other side of the smile I can only show you is

subtitles.original: 甘い　甘い　果実あげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you sweet, sweet fruit

subtitles.original: ささやかクマの誘惑　もっとピカピカ
subtitles.english: A modest bear's temptation, more sparkling

subtitles.original: いつでもここで待ってる　My chocolate
subtitles.english: I'll always be waiting here, my chocolate
